entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle mixed with rain. High 11 except plus 5 in onshore winds.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or rain ending near noon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High 11 except plus 5 in onshore winds. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
